.class public auto ansi sealed ToolboxComponentsCreatedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub ToolboxComponentsCreatedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As ToolboxComponentsCreatedEventArgs)
public delegate void ToolboxComponentsCreatedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, ToolboxComponentsCreatedEventArgs ^ e);

param.name: e
param.span: que proporciona datos para el evento.

span.span: A that provides data for the event.

summary.span: Representa el método que controla el evento .

span.span: Represents the method that handles the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Cuando se crea un delegado , se identifica el método que controlará el evento.When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. Para asociar el evento al controlador, se debe agregar una instancia del delegado al evento.To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. Siempre que se produce el evento, se llama a su controlador, a menos que se quite el delegado.The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. Para obtener más información sobre los delegados de controladores de eventos, vea [controlar y provocar eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples Ejemplo de código siguiente proporciona un método que asocia un controlador de eventos para el eventos de un .The following example code provides a method that attaches an event handler for the event of a . También proporciona un método de controlador de eventos que escribe el nombre del tipo de los componentes que se crearon para el cuando el controlador de eventos se desencadena por un eventos.It also provides a event handler method that writes the name of the type of the components that were created to the when the event handler is raised by a event. [!code-cpp[MoreEventHandlerExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MoreEventHandlerExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[MoreEventHandlerExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MoreEventHandlerExamples/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[MoreEventHandlerExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MoreEventHandlerExamples/VB/form1.vb#2)]
